ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-2520M processor (2.5Ghz - 3.2GHz Max Turboboost, 3MB Cache, HyperThreading)
160GB SSD Solid State Hard Drive (INTEL SATA-3 ASM7)
4GB DDR3 memory (PC3-10600 1333MHz SDRAM SODIMM)
12.5" HD LED Anti-Glare display (1366x768 720p), 16:9 widescreen
Intel HD 3000 graphics
Integrated Bluetooth 3.0
High-speed Intel Centrino 6205-N 300Mbs 802.11 a/g/n Wi-Fi with WiDi Support and 2x2 Antenna
USB 2.0 connectors & 4-in-1 card reader
High Speed Gigabit Ethenet (10/100/100)
Integrated 720p HD webcam
6 Cell Lithium Battery
Fingerprint Reader
ThinkLight
HD graphics support & DisplayPort HD output
Windows 7 Professional 32-Bit Edition Operating System
Color: Business Black
Manufactured By: Lenovo
